mapper.sql: ID, OPTIMISTIC, USER_NAME, PHONE_NO, CARD_TYPE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into credit_card_user (USER_NAME, PHONE_NO, CARD_TYPE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update credit_card_user set OPTIMISTIC = OPTIMISTIC + 1, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_NO = #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_TYPE = #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
